Message:
Unable to stop crying after
the death of my parents
in the conflict between
witches and humans,

“Gran, do you not want to
see Mom and Dad again...?”

“I feel so sad just remembering
the two of them...!”

“Your tears won’t
bring back the dead.
A whole lot of good
that blubbering will do...”

When I looked up at Gran’s face,
she seemed like she was
about to cry herself...

If I keep crying
all the time like this,
it’ll only make Gran cry, too.

So...I promised myself
that I’d never cry again.
